description:
How to build a kick ass looking longboat or ship for your D&D, Pathfinder, or other tabletop role playing game. Free template included that you can use to complete this project.

Download the template: http://drivethrurpg.com/product/178641/Longboat-Template

Join us on facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

Black Magic Craft title music by Black Magic Craft

Background music:
Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
tags: build a boat for dungeons & dragons
title: Longboat (Ship) For D&D Tutorial (Episode 08)
